tool_description: Designe your QR Code in PNG, JPG, SVG & PDF Format
name: Dynamic  Designers QR Code
title: Dynamic  Designers QR Code

api_list.name: Custom QR Codes
api_list.description: You can customize your QR Code Body Shape, eye shape, eyeball shape, background color, body color, eye color, eye ball color, logo, size and output format.

required_parameters.name: config
required_parameters.description:
You can define Body Shape, eye shapes, eyeball shapes.
You can define Background Color, body color,  eyes color, eyeballs color.
Define logo to displayed on the QR Code.
Define output format

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description:
Data to be encoded in the QR Code. You can encode text, url, EMAIL, PHONE, SMS, VCARD, LOCATION, FACEBOOK Profile page, TWITTER Page, YOUTUBE Page, WIFI Settings, EVENT Detail, BITCOIN Detail
For new line, send \r\n  in your text.
